chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
items.plainText: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

items.text: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.
items.plainText: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.

items.text: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.
items.plainText: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

items.text: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
items.plainText: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

items.text: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.
items.plainText: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.

items.text: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
items.plainText: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

items.text: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
items.plainText: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

items.text: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
items.plainText: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
